lg.l: Pallas, the Goddess chaste, & wise,
Descending lately from the Skies,
To Neptune went, & begg'd in form,
He'd give his orders for a Storm;
A Storm to drown that Rascal H──t,
And she would kindly thank him for't;
A Wretch, whom Irish knaves to spite her,
Had lately honour'd with a Mitre.
The God, who favour'd her request,
Assur'd her, he would do his best.
But Venus had been there before,
Pleaded the Bi──p lov'd a Whore,
And had enlarg'd her empire wide,
He own'd no Deity beside,
Att Sea, or Land, if e're they found him
Without a Mistress, hang, or drown him;
Since Burnets death, the Bishop's Bench,
Till H──t arriv'd, ne're kept a Wench
If H──t must sink, she grieves to tell it,
She'll not have left one single Prelate;
And she must own, she did intend him
Elect of Cyprus, in Commendum;
And since her Birth the Ocean gave her,
She could not doubt her Uncle's favour.
Then Proteus made the same request,
But half in earnest, half in Jest,
Said he, great Sovereign of the Main,
To drown him, all attempts are vain,
H──t can assume more shapes than I
A Rake, a Bully, Pimp, & Spy,
Can run, or creep, or fly, or Swim,
All Motions are alike to him;
Turn him adrift, & you shall find,
He knows to sail with every Wind;
Or throw him over Board, he'll ride,
As well against, as with the tide;
And Pallas you apply too late,
For 'tis decreed by Iove, & Fate,
That Ireland must be soon destroy'd,
Th\e·above·a\n who but H──t should be employ'd
You need not therefore be so pert,
As sending Bolton to Clonfert,
I find you did it by your grinning,
Your Business is to mind your spinning;
But how you came to interpose
In making Bishops, no man knows;
Or who regarded that report,
For never have you been at Court.
But if you must have your Petition,
Here's Berkley in the same Condition,
Look, there he stands, & 'tis but Just,
If H──t shall drown, the Doctor must.
But If you leave us Bishop Iudas,
We'll give you Berkley for Bermudas;
Or if 'twill gratifie your spite,
To put him in a plaugy fright,
Altho' 'twill hardly quit the Cost,
You soon shall see him soundly tost,
You'll find \add·him\ swear, Blaspheme, & damn,
And every moment take a dram;
His ghastly Visage with an air
Of reprobation & Dispair
Or when some hidden hole he seeks,
For fear the rest should see he squeeks,
Or as Fitzpatrick did before,
Resolve to perish with his Whore,
Or when he roars, & raves, & stares,
And but for shame, would say his Prayers,
Or would you see his spirits sink
Relaxing downwards in a Stink;
If such a Scene as this w.d please you,
Good Madam Pallas pray be easy;
Let Neptune speak, & Ill consent,
But he'll come back the Rogue he went.
The Goddess, who conceiv'd a hope,
That H──t was destin'd for a Rope,
Beleiv'd it best to condescend,
And Spare a foe, to save a friend,
Yet fearing Berkley might be scar'd,
She left him Virtue for his Guard.
